text.4_Chapter, 3_Mishna, 0_Comment: with a bell - A bell hung around the neck of the animal which emits a sound when it moves
text.9_Chapter, 0_Mishna, 3_Comment: Rather the amount of every measurement that is described here.
text.11_Chapter, 0_Mishna, 7_Comment: now that you've done what you did you don't need to any anything to it
text.18_Chapter, 4_Mishna, 0_Comment: If he was born during twilight, he is circumcised on the ninth day as it is the eighth day from the morrow; if twighlight is still considered day, he is thus circumcised on the ninth day. If the day (preceding the twighlight during which he was born) is Friday, he can't  be circumcised on the following Shabbat in case it is the ninth day and it is a postponed circumcision which does not supersede Shabbat, he must wait until after Shabbat and be circumcised on the tenth day.
